title: Lesson 5: At the Albert Heijn Service Counter

content.text: In this lesson, you're at the service counter of an Albert Heijn supermarket to pick up a package. Let's start by explaining why you're there.

data.meaning: I've come to pick up a package.

content.title: State Your Purpose
content.setting: You are at the service counter in Albert Heijn. The clerk greets you.

conversation_flow.title: Say you are here to pick up a package
Say it's a Bol.com package
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Prima. Voor welk pakketje komt u?

data.phrase: Moet ik de code laten zien?

content.title: Provide the Code
content.setting: The clerk knows you're here for a Bol.com package and now needs the collection code.

conversation_flow.title: Say you have the collection code
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, een pakketje van Bol.com. Heeft u de afhaalcode voor mij?

conversation_flow.title: Ask if you should show the code on your phone

data.phrase: Ik heb mijn ... niet bij me.
data.meaning: I don't have my ... with me.
I only have my bank card.

content.title: The ID Problem
content.setting: You've offered to show your phone, but the clerk asks for something else.

conversation_flow.title: Say you don't have your passport with you
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Dank u. Mag ik ook uw identiteitsbewijs even zien?

conversation_flow.title: Say you only have your bank card
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Heeft u misschien een rijbewijs of ID-kaart?

data.phrase: Ik kan de e-mail met mijn naam laten zien.
data.meaning: I can show the email with my name.

content.title: Suggest an Alternative
content.setting: The clerk has said your bank card isn't enough. You need to suggest another form of proof.

conversation_flow.title: Ask if the confirmation email is enough
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Helaas, een bankpas is niet genoeg als identificatie.

conversation_flow.title: Offer to show the email with your name
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Misschien. Wat staat er in die e-mail?

content.title: Complete the Collection
content.setting: The clerk seems open to your suggestion. Let's finish the transaction.

conversation_flow.title: Confirm that this is okay
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, als uw naam en adres in de e-mail staan, is het goed. Laat maar zien.

conversation_flow.title: Agree to sign for the package
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Perfect, dit is in orde. Hier is uw pakketje. U moet hier nog wel even tekenen.
